name.zh_CN: Pinny - 标记并保存网页位置

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly save and revisit web page locations
short.zh_CN: 轻松保存并重访网页位置

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pinny - Pin & Save Web Locations 📍

Overview:
Pinny is your go-to Chrome extension for effortlessly marking and revisiting specific spots on web pages. Whether you’re conducting research, studying, or simply browsing, Pinny allows you to save the exact locations on web pages that matter most to you. 📌

Key Features:
• Pin Locations: Easily pin specific spots on any webpage. Whether it’s a paragraph, a line of text, or an image, Pinny lets you mark it with just a click. 🔍
• Easy Navigation: Return to your saved locations with a simple click. No more scrolling or searching through pages to find important information. ⏪
• Manage Pins: View, organize, and manage your pins through a user-friendly interface. Search through your pins by title, note, or URL. 📂
• Add Notes: Optionally add notes to your pins for additional context or reminders about why a spot was important. ✍️
• Quick Access Toolbar: Enable the floating toolbar to quickly add pins while you browse. 🛠️
• Grouping and Sorting: Group your pins by webpage or sort them by time—either oldest or newest first, making it easier to find the information you need. 🗂️
• Dark Mode: Enjoy browsing and pinning in both light and dark modes, enhancing visual comfort and accessibility. 🌗

Why Pinny?
Pinny is designed to enhance your productivity and streamline your online activities. It’s perfect for researchers, students, professionals, and anyone who needs to keep track of important web content. Say goodbye to lost information and tedious searches—Pinny keeps everything you need just a click away. 👋

Get Started:
Installing and using Pinny is straightforward:
1. Add Pinny to Chrome.
2. Navigate to any webpage.
3. Click the Pinny icon to open the floating toolbar and start pinning locations.
4. Access and manage all your pins anytime from the Pinny popup. 🎉

Stay organized, stay efficient, and never lose track of important web locations again with Pinny!
long.zh_CN:
Pinny - 标记并保存网页位置 📍

概览：
Pinny 是您理想的 Chrome 扩展程序，用于轻松标记并重访网页上的特定位置。无论您是在进行研究、学习还是简单浏览，Pinny 都能帮您保存那些对您最重要的网页精确位置。📌

主要功能：
• 标记位置： 轻松在任何网页上标记特定位置。无论是段落、文本行还是图片，Pinny 都让您只需点击一下即可标记。🔍
• 轻松导航： 通过简单点击返回您保存的位置。不再需要滚动或搜索页面来找到重要信息。⏪
• 管理标记： 通过用户友好的界面查看、组织和管理您的标记。通过标题、注释或 URL 搜索您的标记。📂
• 添加注释： 可选地为您的标记添加注释，以提供更多上下文或提醒该位置的重要性。✍️
• 快速访问工具栏： 启用浮动工具栏，以便在浏览时快速添加标记。🛠️
• 分组和排序： 按网页或时间对您的标记进行分组或排序——将最旧的或最新的放在前面，使您更容易找到所需信息。🗂️
• 暗黑模式： 在明亮和暗黑模式下享受浏览和标记的乐趣，增强视觉舒适性和可访问性。🌗

为什么选择 Pinny？
Pinny 旨在提升您的生产力并简化您的在线活动。它非常适合研究人员、学生、专业人士以及需要跟踪重要网络内容的任何人。告别丢失信息和繁琐的搜索——Pinny 让您需要的一切都只需点击一下。👋

开始使用：
安装并使用 Pinny 非常简单：
1. 将 Pinny 添加到 Chrome。
2. 导航至任何网页。
3. 点击 Pinny 图标打开浮动工具栏并开始标记位置。
4. 从 Pinny 弹出窗口随时访问和管理所有标记。🎉

保持组织、保持高效，再也不会丢失重要的网页位置了，有了 Pinny！
